headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: keywords Conditional
parameters.description: Either keywords or keyword has to be set. If keywords and keyword are passed simultaneously, keyword will be ignored. A list of seed keywords that you provide to search for additional interest categories. Each seed keyword will be used separately to generate corresponding additional interest categories. Max size: 10.

parameters.name: keyword Conditional
parameters.description: Either keywords or keyword has to be set. If keywords and keyword are passed simultaneously, keyword will be ignored. One seed keyword that you provide to search for additional interest categories.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Search mode. Enum values: FUZZ_MATCH , SEMANTIC_RECOMMEND . Default value: FUZZ_MATCH .

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Keyword language. Enum values: fr , id , it , ja , ms , ar , vi , en , ru , es , th , tr , hi , zh , de , ko . Default value: en . Note that target audience languages are not limited by keyword languages. You can use English categories to target audience that do not speak English.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of additional interest categories you want to get. Default value: 50. Value range: 1-50.

parameters.name: audience_type
parameters.description: Audience type. Enum values: GENERAL_INTEREST : General interest. The audiences have a general, long-term interest in a video category. PURCHASE_INTENTION (deprecated): Purchase intent. The audiences' recent behavior suggests they may buy something related to a content category. Default value: GENERAL_INTEREST .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The return code. For the complete list of error codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The return message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: recommended_keywords
fields.description: A list of additional interest categories.

fields.name: input_keyword
fields.description: Returned only when keywords is included in the request and contains more than one keyword. The specific seed keyword for which the additional interest category is generated. For instance, if the additional interest category "Tester" is generated for the seed keyword "test", the returned input_keyword will be "test" , and keyword will be "Tester" .

fields.name: keyword_id
fields.description: ID of the additional interest category.

fields.name: language
fields.description: Language of the additional interest category. Enum values: fr , id , it , ja , ms , ar , vi , en , ru , es , th , tr , hi , zh , de , ko .

fields.name: status
fields.description: Whether the additional interest category will be effective. Enum values: EFFECTIVE : effective. An additional interest category is effective if using it can reach a reasonable number of people. INEFFECTIVE : ineffective. An additional interest category is ineffective if the estimated audience size is too small. Note : Only effective additional interest categories can be used in ad groups to target audiences.
